element.short: Concept that represents this section in a questionnaire
element.definition: Identifies a how this group of questions is known in a particular terminology such as LOINC.
element.comments: The code(s) for the "root" group apply to the questionnaire as a whole.
element.requirements: Allows linking of groups of questions (and complete Questionnaire resources) to formal terminologies.

binding.description: Codes for groupings of questionnaire questions.
